enable_tr3_sidesteps.Title: Enhanced sidesteps
enable_tr3_sidesteps.Description: Enables TR3+ style sidesteps, e.g. shift+directional arrows. Dedicated sidestep buttons will still work.

enable_enhanced_look.Title: Look while running
enable_enhanced_look.Description: Allows Lara to look while running, jumping etc. - similar to TR2 style.

enable_numeric_keys.Title: Numeric key quick item use
enable_numeric_keys.Description:
Enables quick weapon draws and medipack usage.
- 1: Draw pistols
- 2: Draw shotgun
- 3: Draw magnums
- 4: Draw Uzis
- 8: Use small medipack
- 9: Use large medipack

fix_alligator_ai.Title: Fix alligator AI
fix_alligator_ai.Description: Fixes alligators dealing no damage if Lara remains still in the water.

fix_descending_glitch.Title: Fix breakable floor falls
fix_descending_glitch.Description: Fixes sidestepping and walking backwards on breakable tiles causing Lara to immediately descend to the tile underneath.

fix_bridge_collision.Title: Fix bridge collision
fix_bridge_collision.Description: Fixes Lara not being able to grab parts of some bridges and invisible walls at the edge.

fix_floor_data_issues.Title: Fix Great Pyramid secret
fix_floor_data_issues.Description: Fixes the secret trigger in the final level not working.

fix_qwop_glitch.Title: Fix QWOP glitch
fix_qwop_glitch.Description: Fixes Lara jumping on small steps sometimes resulting in a weird running animation, known as a QWOP state.

fix_tihocan_secret_sound.Title: Fix Tomb of Tihocan secret sound
fix_tihocan_secret_sound.Description: Prevents the secret sound from incorrectly playing when using the golden key in Tomb of Tihocan.

fix_wall_jump_glitch.Title: Fix wall jump glitch
fix_wall_jump_glitch.Description: Fixes Lara jumping through objects and moving up certain slopes.

enable_cheats.Title: Cheats
enable_cheats.Description:
Enables various cheats:
- F11: hold to heal Lara.
- F11 + WALK key: hold to hurt Lara.
- L: immediately end the level.
- I: give Lara all weapons; a boost of ammo and medipacks; and all plot items for the current level.
- O: enable DOZY cheat (swimming midair).
     - WALK key: exit DOZY.
     - GUN key: open the closest door (doesn't work in certain places).

start_lara_hitpoints.Title: Lara's starting health
start_lara_hitpoints.Description: Sets Lara's health value for the beginning of each level.

disable_medpacks.Title: Remove medipacks
disable_medpacks.Description: Removes all medipacks from the game (for No Meds challenge runs).

disable_healing_between_levels.Title: Do not heal on level finish
disable_healing_between_levels.Description: Stops Lara from healing between level reloads (for No Heal challenge runs).

disable_shotgun.Title: Remove shotgun
disable_shotgun.Description: Removes all shotgun and shotgun shell pickups from the game.

disable_magnums.Title: Remove magnums
disable_magnums.Description: Removes all magnum guns and magnum ammo pickups from the game.

disable_uzis.Title: Remove Uzis
disable_uzis.Description: Removes all Uzi guns and Uzi ammo pickups from the game.

walk_to_items.Title: Animated interactions
walk_to_items.Description: Makes Lara walk to pickups and switches when nearby instead of teleporting to them.

enable_deaths_counter.Title: Count number of deaths
enable_deaths_counter.Description: Enables showing a deaths counter in the compass and in the level statistics. Death count is updated in the currently loaded save as soon as Lara dies.

enable_total_stats.Title: Final statistics screen
enable_total_stats.Description: Enables a total game statistics screen that plays after the credits.

enable_compass_stats.Title: Level statistics in compass
enable_compass_stats.Description: Enables showing level statistics when the compass is selected.

enable_detailed_stats.Title: Show total kills and pickups
enable_detailed_stats.Description: Enables showing the maximum pickup count and kill count on each level. This includes unobtainable items.

enable_demo.Title: Enable demo mode
enable_demo.Description: Enables demos showing in the main menu.

disable_trex_collision.Title: Remove dead T-Rex collision
disable_trex_collision.Description: Removes all collision with T-Rex upon death. This helps when the T-Rex's body blocks the passage out.

fix_shotgun_targeting.Title: Enhanced shotgun targeting
fix_shotgun_targeting.Description: Makes the shotgun no longer fire when a locked target moves out of Lara's sight, similar to other guns.

revert_to_pistols.Title: Pistols as primary weapon
revert_to_pistols.Description: Makes Lara revert to pistols at the start of each level (in line with TombATI behavior).

maximum_save_slots.Title: Number of save slots
maximum_save_slots.Description: Changes the number of available save slots.

enable_enhanced_saves.Title: Save additional game information
enable_enhanced_saves.Description: Enhances savegames so that graphic effects, waterfall mist, flame emitters, and more are saved instead of disappearing on load.

change_pierre_spawn.Title: Change Pierre spawn behavior
change_pierre_spawn.Description: Makes a freshly triggered (runaway) Pierre replace an already existing (runaway) Pierre.

enable_timer_in_inventory.Title: Timer counts in inventory
enable_timer_in_inventory.Description: Makes the in-game timer work even while the game is showing the inventory.

fov_value.Title: Field of view
fov_value.Description: The desired field of view in degrees, which overrides the hardcoded default. The default values are 80 (horizontal) and 65 (vertical).

fov_vertical.Title: Vertical FOV
fov_vertical.Description: Interprets the field of view as vertical instead of horizontal. May be advantageous for widescreen resolutions, especially for multi-screen setups, since it distorts the left and right side instead of cropping away the top and bottom part of the screen.

resolution_width.Title: Resolution width
resolution_width.Description: Overrides game resolution. Leave at 0 or negative values to automatically guess from the screen size. Note: these values only override the last position in the game resolutions menu that normally defaults to the screen resolution, so in order for this to work, make sure you have selected the last resolution.

resolution_height.Title: Resolution height
resolution_height.Description: Overrides game resolution. See notes on Resolution Width.

enable_3d_pickups.Title: 3D pickups
enable_3d_pickups.Description: Enables 3D models to be rendered in place of the sprites for pickup items.

enable_round_shadow.Title: Rounded shadows
enable_round_shadow.Description: Enables round shadows instead of the default octagonal ones.

enable_shotgun_flash.Title: Shotgun flash
enable_shotgun_flash.Description: Draws flames when firing the shotgun, like for other guns.

enable_music_in_menu.Title: Enable main menu music
enable_music_in_menu.Description: Plays music in the main menu.

enable_pitched_sounds.Title: Enable pitched sounds
enable_pitched_sounds.Description: Allows sound effects to be randomly, slightly pitched to vary the game sounds.

enable_music_in_inventory.Title: Enable game sounds in inventory
enable_music_in_inventory.Description: Allows game sounds to continue to play in the inventory screen.

fix_secrets_killing_music.Title: Do not stop music on secrets pick-ups
fix_secrets_killing_music.Description: Fixes the sound of collecting a secret stopping the active music track.

fix_speeches_killing_music.Title: Do not stop music when enemies speak
fix_speeches_killing_music.Description: Fixes enemies stopping the active music track when they speak.

enable_ps_uzi_sfx.Title: Enable PS Uzi SFX
enable_ps_uzi_sfx.Description: Changes the Uzi sound effects to match the PlayStation version.

menu_style.Title: Menu style
menu_style.Description:
Changes how menus are displayed.
 - PC: UI style matches the PC version.
 - PS1: UI style matches the PS1 version.

healthbar_showing_mode.Title: Healthbar behavior
healthbar_showing_mode.Description:
Changes how the healthbar is displayed.
- Default: show the healthbar at the start of a level, after getting hit, or while having weapons equipped; flash the healthbar if it's already on screen when Lara's health is 20% or below (TombATI).
- Flashing or default: constantly flash the healthbar when Lara's health is 20% or below, or show under default circumstances.
- Flashing only: show the healthbar *only* when Lara's health is 20% or below (for challenge runs).
- Always: always show the healthbar.
- Never: never display the healthbar (for challenge runs).
- PS1: show the healthbar under default circumstances with no flashing.

healthbar_location.Title: Healthbar location
healthbar_location.Description: Location where the healthbar is displayed.

airbar_showing_mode.Title: Airbar behavior
airbar_showing_mode.Description:
Changes how the airbar is displayed.
- Default: show the airbar only in the water and flash the airbar when Lara's oxygen is 20% or below (TombATI).
- Flashing only: show the airbar *only* when Lara's oxygen is 20% or below (for challenge runs).
- Never: never display the airbar (for challenge runs).
- PS1: show the airbar under default circumstances with no flashing.

airbar_location.Title: Airbar location
airbar_location.Description: Location where the airbar is displayed.

enable_enemy_healthbar.Title: Show enemy Healthbars
enable_enemy_healthbar.Description: Enables showing a healthbar for the active enemy.

enemy_healthbar_location.Title: Enemy healthbar location
enemy_healthbar_location.Description: Location where the enemy healthbar is displayed.

enable_smooth_bars.Title: Smoother bars
enable_smooth_bars.Description: Makes the healthbar and airbar use smooth color transitions.

enable_fade_effects.Title: Fade effects
enable_fade_effects.Description: Makes the inventory and pause screen use fade transitions for the semitransparent backdrop, similar to PS1.
